agent_instructions.purpose: Analyze the productivity suite and either create new useful tools or improve existing ones
guidelines: Focus on practical, everyday productivity improvements
Prefer simple, standalone scripts over complex systems
Each tool should solve a specific problem well
Tools should work on Linux and be shell/Python based for portability
Avoid external API dependencies unless essential
Include usage documentation in each tool
Consolidate tools when functionality overlaps - merge similar tools into one cohesive solution
Prefer enhancing existing tools over creating new ones when the new functionality logically extends an existing tool
Before creating a new tool, review existing tools to determine if the feature could be added there instead
improvement_priorities: Add missing features to incomplete tools
Create new tools only when no existing tool can be reasonably extended
